sys_script.name: Validate Login

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_c04e799b4783511016869128436d43e2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_849361_bookscart_user_login</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate Login</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var userName = current.user_name;
	var pwd = current.password;
	
	var usrDetails = new GlideRecord('x_849361_bookscart_userregistraction');
	usrDetails.addQuery('user_name',userName);
	usrDetails.query();
	
	if(usrDetails.next()){
		if(usrDetails.password == pwd){
			gs.addInfoMessage('Login Successful');
		}
		else{
			gs.addErrorMessage('Invalid Credentials');
			current.setAbortAction(true);
		}
	}else{
		gs.addErrorMessage('User Details not Found');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-14 06:44:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c04e799b4783511016869128436d43e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Login</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BooksCart" source="x_849361_bookscart">da6ab4474703111016869128436d43e4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BooksCart">da6ab4474703111016869128436d43e4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c04e799b4783511016869128436d43e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-14 06:44:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c04e799b4783511016869128436d43e2"/></record_update>
